insert into tblOrder( no,code,member_no,order_name,order_tel,password,payment_status,order_status ,payment_way,receiver_name,receiver_tel1,receiver_tel2,receiver_postcode, receiver_address,message,invoice_code) values(null,#{code},#{memberNo},AES_ENCRYPT(#{orderName},'CAFE24'),AES_ENCRYPT(#{orderTel},'CAFE24'),SHA2(#{password},512),#{paymentStatus}, #{orderStatus},#{paymentWay},AES_ENCRYPT(#{receiverName},'CAFE24'),AES_ENCRYPT(#{receiverTel1},'CAFE24'),AES_ENCRYPT(#{receiverTel2},'CAFE24'),AES_ENCRYPT(#{receiverPostcode},'CAFE24'), AES_ENCRYPT(#{receiverAddress},'CAFE24'),#{message},AES_ENCRYPT(#{invoiceCode},'CAFE24'))
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: select name as goodsName, option_name as optionName, cnt as orderCnt, code as orderCode, status as orderStatus, sailing_price as sailingPrice, invoice_code as invoiceCode from tblOrder o inner join tblOrderGoods og on o.no = og.order_no inner join tblGoodsDetail gd on gd.no = og.goods_detail_no inner join tblGoods g on g.no = gd.goods_no where code = #{code}

select no, code, cast(AES_DECRYPT(order_name, 'CAFE24') as char(200)) as orderName, cast(AES_DECRYPT(order_tel, 'CAFE24') as char(200)) as orderTel, payment_status as paymentStatus, order_status as orderStatus, payment_way as paymentWay, cast(AES_DECRYPT(receiver_name, 'CAFE24') as char(200)) as receiverName, cast(AES_DECRYPT(receiver_tel1, 'CAFE24') as char(200)) as receiverTel1, cast(AES_DECRYPT(receiver_tel2, 'CAFE24') as char(200)) as receiverTel2, cast(AES_DECRYPT(receiver_postcode, 'CAFE24') as char(200)) as receiverPostcode, cast(AES_DECRYPT(receiver_address, 'CAFE24') as char(200)) as receiverAddress, message, cast(AES_DECRYPT(invoice_code, 'CAFE24') as char(200)) as invoiceCode from tblOrder where code = #{code}
